hackathon-description-text: HackSC is the premier hackathon hosted at the University of Southern California. We empower hackers to learn and explore new technologies through hands-on development and experience.
hackathon-eligibility:
1. Teams may be as large as you like. However, if your team would like to be eligible for prizes/competition, the maximum team size is 4 people
2. Code must have been written at HackSC 2015
hackathon-rules:
1. Be respectful of the people and equipment around you
2. Pick up after yourselves
3. HAVE FUN AND LEARN SOMETHING NEW!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team will receive Microsoft Bands v2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Microsoft Hack - Best Use of Azure

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Qualifying technologies: OneNote, Office 365, Azure, Kinect for Windows, Windows 10 App, OneNote, Bing, Visual Studio
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Microsoft Hack - Best Overall Use of Microsoft Technology
Two Sigma - Best use of Beaker

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team will receive Disney Infinity 3.0 Edition: Star Wars™ Saga Bundle
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Disney - Best Use of Visual Media

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team will receive: Apple Watch (stainless steel) 42mm with white sport band
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Apple - Best iOS or OS X app

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best hack that improves the world
